settings.faq-title: How do I track my order?
settings.faq-content: Â Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can enter this tracking number on our website's Order Tracking page to monitor the status and location of your package.

settings.faq-title: I want to edit or cancel my order
settings.faq-content:
Due to our prompt order processing, we are unable to accommodate certain changes or cancellations to your order. These include, but are not limited to:

Canceling your order or specific items within the order.

Changing the billing or shipping address associated with your order.

Modifying the payment method used for the order.

Altering the selected shipping method for the delivery.

Changing the color or size of any item(s) in your order.

Adding or removing item(s) from the order.

If for any reason you decide that you no longer wish to keep your order, you can initiate an exchange after the items have been delivered to you. Our exchange policy provides details on the process and eligibility for exchanges.

Yes! We provide international shipping services to various regions through UPS. We strive to make our products accessible to customers worldwide. However, please note that our ability to ship to specific international locations may be subject to change at any time and for various reasons. If we determine that we are unable to ship to your country, we will promptly cancel your order and issue a refund.

Shipping charges for your order will be calculated and presented to you during the checkout process. The exact cost will depend on factors such as the destination, package weight, and shipping method chosen.

settings.faq-title: Which payment methods do you accept?
